data.title: h1b Complete List of Companies 2007
data.meta_description: h1b Complete List of Companies 2007 - Free ebook download as PDF File (.pdf) or read book online for free. The document lists the top 50 employers who were approved the most H-1B petitions for initial beneficiaries in fiscal year 2007. Infosys Technologies Limited received the most approvals with 4,559. The other top employers included Wipro Limited, Satyam Computer Services Ltd, Cognizant Tech Solutions US Corp, and Microsoft Corp. The employers span various industries including technology, consulting, healthcare, education, and more.
